name: Notion 50/30/20 Budgeting System
description: Transform Your Financial Future with the 50/30/20 Budgeting System!Utilize this template to keep track of your income, expenses, savings, and cash flow!Have you ever been in a situation where you're overspending and you don't know where your money went?If you are either someoneâ€¦Who lacks financial visibility and you just don't know what system to use?Who has difficulty following all the complex budgeting systems out there?Who feels like they don't have enough savings?You are not alone. We see yo
features: Who lacks financial visibility and you just don't know what system to use?; Who has difficulty following all the complex budgeting systems out there?; Who feels like they don't have enough savings?; 50/30/20 budgeting system; Accounts balances; Monthly summary of the income, needs, savings, and wants allocation.; Savings graph (How to set up video is included); Template to set up the allocation.; Monthly views to see transactions specific to each month.; Add to a specific account or transfer to a different account feature.
